articles.author: Zoe Guy
articles.title: Lauryn Hill, Fugees Reunite on Miseducation Anniversary Tour - Vulture
articles.description: Ms. Lauryn Hill announced The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill 25th Anniversary Tour on August 22, a 17-date showcase that will hit arenas around the world. The Fugees are co-headliners. Koffee will support the Australian leg.
articles.content: Ready or not, here comes Ms. Lauryn Hill. The Grammy-winning hip-hop artist announced The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill 25th Anniversary Tour on August 22, a 17-date showcase that will hit arenas aroun… [+2135 chars]
